title: Ticket #5877: Add Gridmanager bindings for using the openstack gahp
description:
In support of the new Openstack GAHP created in #5318, the gridmanager and a few other places need updated to add the ability to use the new GAHP.

Jaime suggests that the bindings should mirror the existing GCE bindings, as they're reasonably similar in their level of complexity and actions.
creator: iain.steers
